# DualShock controller input names

**API Collection**

Constants for names of DualShock 4 elements.

## Overview

Use these constants as the keys when accessing [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCDualShockGamepad] elements by name using the [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCPhysicalInputProfile/allElements] property, `subscript(_:)` notation, or similar [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCPhysicalInputProfile] APIs.

## DualShock controller button names

- **GCInputDualShockTouchpadButton**: The name of the button functionality of the DualShock 4 touchpad.
- **GCInputDualShockTouchpadOne**: The name of the first finger element to touch down on the DualShock 4 touchpad.
- **GCInputDualShockTouchpadTwo**: The name of the second finger element to touch down on the DualShock 4 touchpad.

## Element names

- **GCPhysicalInputElementName**: The name of a physical input element.
- **GCPhysicalInputElementTypedName**: A type-safe name for accessing elements of a physical input element collection.
- **GCButtonElementName**: The names of the button elements.
- **GCAxisElementName**: The names for the elements that provide values along an axis.
- **GCSwitchElementName**: The name for an element that represents a switch.
- **GCDirectionPadElementName**: The names for directional pad elements.
- **Extended gamepad input names**: Constants for names of extended gamepad elements.
- **Xbox controller input names**: Constants for names of Xbox elements.
- **Micro gamepad input names**: Constants for names of micro gamepad elements.
- **Directional Gamepad Input Names**: Constants for names of directional pad elements.
